item.title: Bash bits: find has a -delete flag
item.description: Bash Bits are small examples, tips and tutorials for the bash shell. This bash bit shows you that find has a -delete option. I recently found this out, before I would always use -exec rm {} ;. The delete flag is shorter, performs better and is easier to remember.
